title: Personalized Science Inquiry Process Using Augmented Reality Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of physics/chemistry concepts and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: All learners possess smartphones but lack PC environments; virtual simulations are necessary due to limited experimental equipment.

learning_goals: Visualization and interaction with molecular structures using AR applications
Provide personalized feedback based on individual learning pattern data at least three times

Using one-week learning analytics reports, learners can identify three or more learning patterns (e.g., concentration duration, error types) and establish two or more specific learning strategies (e.g., time management, error note-taking methods) to incorporate into action plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
